author: J. Edward Moreno
title: WHO investigating patients who have tested positive for coronavirus after recovery
description: The World Health Organization (WHO) is investigating reports of patients testing positive for the coronavirus after allegedly recovering from the disease, according to...
content:
The World Health Organization (WHO) is investigating reports of patients testing positive for the coronavirus after allegedly recovering from the disease, according to Reuters.  
Jeong Eun-kyeong, director of the Korean Centers for Disease Control (CDC), sai… [+1916 chars]
